title: One Undead Honeymoon In Judecca
description: Sylphie is supposed to be getting ready for her wedding with Thetis, yet she prowls the bars in Georgetown instead. Can there be a one-and-only for a vampiress, or is she only a blood-lush, promiscuous by definition? Sylphie's philosophical questions are only the beginning of the wildest and deadliest night of her vampire un-life, and the journey for love that leads all the way to the desolate wastes of Hell. A 5250-word sensual lesbian short story.
author: Jacquotte Fox
